item.title: Hello, World!
item.author: mjs2600@gmail.com (Michael Simpson)
item.description: In this blog I plan to share interesting things that I find. I’m also hoping to post some of my half finished ideas and experiements. I think more clearly when I write and I’d like to take advantage of that to work through the things bouncing around in my head.

item.title: About Me
item.author: mjs2600@gmail.com (Michael Simpson)
item.description: { "@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "Person", "name": "Michael Simpson", "address": { "@type": "PostalAddress", "addressCountry": "USA", "addressRegion": "VT", "addressLocality": "Middlebury" }, "image": "https://mjs2600.github.io/images/profile.png", "spouse": { "@type": "Person", "name": "Mary Jane Simpson", "url": "http://www.middlebury.edu/academics/chem/faculty/node/539926" }, "jobTitle": "Chief Data Scientist", "alumniOf": { "@type": "EducationalOrganization", "name": "Georgia Institute of Technology", "alternateName": "Georgia Tech", "url": "https://www.gatech.edu/" }, "gender": "male", "url": "http://mjs2600.github.io/", "sameAs" : [ "https://twitter.com/mjs2600", "https://mastodon.technology/web/accounts/78564" ] } I live in Middlebury, Vermont with my wife, Mary Jane, and two small children.
